introduce.description: Scripts are the core tools for automated testing, used to verify software system functionality, performance, and stability. You can create test scripts to run various tests, or create Mock scripts to generate test data.

workItems.testScript: Create test scripts to run functional, performance, stability, and custom tests;
workItems.mockScript: Create Mock scripts to generate test data and store it in data spaces, data sources, etc.

messages.namePlaceholder: Please enter script name, maximum 200 characters
messages.descriptionPlaceholder: Please enter script description, maximum 800 characters

globalAuth.description: Grant specified "function" operation permissions to users, departments, and groups. "View" permission is required when granting permissions. Users can only authorize functions for which they have authorization permissions.
globalAuth.title: Script Permission

messages.maxBatchLimit: Maximum support for batch operations of {maxNum} scripts, currently selected {selectedNum} scripts.
messages.executeConfirm: Are you sure to execute the selected {num} scripts?
messages.executeFail: All {num} selected scripts failed to execute
messages.executePartial: {successNum} selected scripts executed successfully, {errorNum} scripts failed to execute
messages.maxDeleteLimit: Maximum support for batch deletion of {maxNum} scripts, currently selected {num} scripts.
messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete the selected「{num}」 scripts?
messages.addExecuteSuccess: Script created and executed successfully, please check details in "Execute"
messages.deleteScriptConfirm: Deleting script 「{name}」 will also delete associated scenarios, are you sure to delete?
messages.deleteScriptConfirmSimple: Are you sure to delete script 「{name}」?
messages.executeScriptConfirmSimple: Are you sure to execute script 「{name}」?

tips.authOn: After enabling permission control, manual authorization is required to have corresponding operation permissions.
tips.authOff: No permission restrictions, all users in the account can view and operate, permission control is not enabled by default.

form.uploadTip: Paste content directly or drag files or click to upload files, file size should not exceed 20M

messages.fileTooLarge: Uploaded file or text size exceeds 20M, please upload again

messages.addExecutionSuccess: Execution added successfully, please check details in "Execute".

ai.title: Auto Create Script
ai.placeholder: Describe your requirements to the AI agent, such as: Generate a performance test script for querying user information.
